Dallas Mavericks All-Star Luka Doni became the first player in NBA history to record a 35+ point triple-double in four straight games as his side outlasted the Miami Heat, 114-108, on Thursday.

articles.title: Wisconsin Beats Rutgers: SOCIAL MEDIA REACTIONS - Outkick
articles.description: The Wisconsin Badgers beat Rutgers to improve to 19-11. What seed with the Badgers get in the NCAA Tournament?
articles.content:
Wisconsin Badgers basketball coach Greg Gard bought himself some breathing room Thursday night after beating Rutgers.
